metadata.Title: CVE-2018-20358 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.Description:
An invalid memory address dereference was discovered in the lt_predictionfunction of libfaad/lt_predict.c in Freeware Advanced Audio Decoder 2(FAAD2) 2.8.8. The vulnerability causes a segmentation fault andapplication crash, which leads to denial of service.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-20358` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

faad - 2.8.8-3.2
libfaad2 - 2.8.8-3.2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: faad2 package in mantic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.8.8-3.2').
